text: AKMU (also known as Akdong Musician) is a duo consisting of brother and sister, Lee Chanhyuk and Lee Suhyun. The duo performed together for the 1st time at an audition for LOEN in 2012, and eventually signed under YG Entertainnment. The group officially debuted in 2014 with their album PLAY. In 2017, Chanhyuk enlisted for the military, thus putting the group on hiatus until his return in 2019. ==Discography== ===Albums=== * PLAY (2014) * Winter (2017) * Sailing (2019) ===Mini-Albums=== * Spring (2016) ===Single Albums=== * Summer Episode (2017) ===Non-Single Albums=== * Time and Fallen Leaves (2014) * Eyes, Nose, Lips (2014) Category:2010s South Korean music groups Category:2012 establishments in South Korea Category:2020s South Korean music groups Category:Folk music groups Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:Sibling musical duos Category:South Korean musical groups Category:YG Entertainment artists
title: AKMU
